text: Raju Narayan Todsam was a member of the 13th Maharashtra Legislative Assembly. He represents the Arni Assembly Constituency. He belongs to the Bharatiya Janata Party. On 28 November 2015, Todsam was arrested for abusing and assaulting an employee of the Maharashtra State Electricity Distribution Company Limited in 2013. ==References== Category:Members of the Maharashtra Legislative Assembly Category:Maharashtra MLAs 2014–2019 Category:Bharatiya Janata Party politicians from Maharashtra Category:Living people Category:People from Yavatmal district Category:Marathi politicians Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Raju Narayan Todsam
